name: LG Backup Extracted MMS Message
summary: A PDU file is an MMS message extracted from an LG backup ( .LBF ) file. PDU files are stored in .ZIP archives. You can extract PDU files from an LBF file using a hex editor, such as HxD. However, there is no known way to open PDU files and view their contents.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
